articles.description: In July 2021, Curtis revealed to the world that her youngest daughter is male-to-female transgender and had changed her name from Thomas to Ruby
articles.content:
Jamie Lee Curtis beamed with pride as she hit the red carpet with her adopted daughters Ruby, 26, and Annie, 35, at the premiere of Halloween Ends in Los Angeles on Tuesday night.
